I have spent my career in public service standing up for the rights of all Arizonans, including our state's LGBTQ+ community. Whether fighting to repeal "Don't Ask, Don't Tell", managing the campaign against a constitutional ban on gay marriage in Arizona, or serving as vice-chair of the Congressional LGBTQ+ Equality Caucus, I have always and will always be a champion for LGBTQ+ equality.
